首先，谢谢您的回复。
windows edge，密码提示相关很多情况总能触发这个。我把相关代码还有这个迷你小页面 pages截图 还有明确的触发视频都放在了下面，麻烦您再看看

import { Button, Form, Input, Checkbox, Switch } from "antd";

function App() {
return (
<div
style={{
        display: "flex",
        justifyContent: "center",
        alignItems: "center",
      }} >
<Form
name="wrap"
labelCol={{ flex: "80px" }}
labelAlign="left"
labelWrap
wrapperCol={{ flex: 1 }}
colon={false}
style={{
          width: 500,
          position: "absolute",
          top: "50%",
          left: "50%",
          transform: "translate(-50%,-50%)",
        }} >
<Form.Item label="特征A" name="F1" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
<Input maxLength="15" />
</Form.Item>

        <Form.Item label="特征B" name="F2" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
          <Input maxLength="5" />
        </Form.Item>

        <Form.Item label="特征C" name="F3" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
          <Input maxLength="5" />
        </Form.Item>

        <Form.Item label="特征D" name="F4" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
          <Input maxLength="5" />
        </Form.Item>
        <Form.Item label="特征E" name="F5" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
          <Input maxLength="5" />
        </Form.Item>
        <Form.Item label="糖尿病" name="F6" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
          <Switch checkedChildren="有" unCheckedChildren="无"  />
        </Form.Item>
        <Form.Item label="高血压" name="F7" rules={[{ required: true }]}>
          <Switch checkedChildren="有" unCheckedChildren="无" />
        </Form.Item>

        <Form.Item label=" " style={{position:"fixed",left:220}}>
          <Button type="primary" htmlType="submit">
            提交
          </Button>
        </Form.Item>
      </Form>
    </div>

);
}

export default App;
